otherTimes.secondaryText: and the video will play again

banner.contact: If you are interested in working with me, please send me an email or contact me in any other way convenient for you

hero.subtitle: general information
hero.description: If you are looking for a hard-working, conscientious and ready for new challenges employee - then I am the person you need. I advanced twice in the courses, because I devoted all my time to studying - I was a Scrum Master and a Team Leader on team projects. Even before the completion of the courses, I already participated in commercial projects ( one of them social, the other - a start-up ), after completion - in another commercial one from the company ( you can see all the works on the projects page )

features.title: features
features.subtitle: each component is interactive, so when you click or hover over it, the element will react - try and see

first.title: Responsive Design
first.subtitle: See projects on different devices
first.text: Explore a diverse collection of my creative endeavors, including web design, JavaScript / TypeScript and mini projects. Each project shows my creativity, attention to detail, and passion for delivering visually stunning and engaging experiences

second.title: Code Quality
second.subtitle: Explore the code in the repository
second.text: I proud of myself on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code. Learn more about my coding standards and practices that contribute to the functionality and performance of the projects I undertake

third.title: Creative Projects
third.subtitle: Evaluate the original approach
third.text: Dive into my problem-solving skills and logical thinking. Explore how I approach challenges, find innovative solutions, and adapt to emerging technologies. Discover my commitment to continuous learning and improvement, ensuring every project meets high-quality standards and exceeds expectations

3d.title: Below are the «workhorses»
3d.subtitle: pay attention to this prompt for understanding of how to interact with next section
3d.commentToSubtitle: when mouse hovering over this text block, other hints will appear ( on a device without a mouse, you need to click on this text )
3d.prompt: * in the block where the 3D objects are presented, in order to scroll the page, use the scrollbar on the right edge ( zoom actions will bring objects closer or further away )
3d.comment: ** below are 3D objects, which are interactive - you can rotate them, enlarge, reduce, view them from all sides and do whatever you want ;)
3d.hint: *** if you are using mobile, click outside to close this text block
3d.inFuture: 2. second - I want to use it in the future
3d.summary: *** I hope that you enjoyed this interactive part
3d.heading: My devices

gallery.title: 3-d gallery
gallery.subtitle: this is the last but not least section of the home page in terms of interactivity, so I'm sure you will enjoy it ^_^

about.title: Prysiazhna Anastasiia
about.description: I am a full-stack web developer with a passion for building beautiful and functional websites

first.title: Responsibility
first.description: I was the head of a children's dance studio, founded my own stretching studio, and worked on team projects as a Scrum Master and Team Lead. I believe this is enough to define my level of organization, proactivity, and responsibility

second.title: Hard Work
second.description: I do everything to the fullest extent and take the initiative to do even more. I always conscientiously finish tasks assigned to me

third.title: Perseverance
third.description: When I faced with difficulties, I don't give up. On the contrary, challenges push me to increase my skills and knowledge

forth.title: Punctuality
forth.description: I always plan my time and often arrive early for meetings, events, and other commitments. I value both my own time and other people

fifth.title: Communication Skills
fifth.description: Considering my previous experience of working with a large amount of people of different age groups, I have acquired strong communication skills, conflict resolution abilities, and the ability to handle various situations

sixth.title: Stress Resistance
sixth.description: Since there is a lot of stress in our lives, I have learned to stay focused and work effectively in stressful situations

seventh.title: Kindness
seventh.description: I am a positive person who always seeks the best in every person and situation

about.confirm: To confirm my studies in the courses and their successful completion, I am attaching a certificate and screens of the progress of my studies from my personal course cabinet
about.github: Also, to highlight my desire for learning, improving skills and self-improvement, I am adding activity statistics for the year 2023

title.second: Screens of my personal course cabinet
title.third: My GitHub coding year in review
